data.title: The Royal Sonesta Kaua'i Resort Lihue
data.meta_description: Our resort in Kauai boasts a stunning beachfront location and offers amenities such as on-site dining, a spa, fitness center, and pool.
data.text:
Nestled on a golden sand beach, The Royal Sonesta Kaua'i Resort - Lihue offers a central location in the heart of Kaua'i. Find your paradise in our recently renovated guest rooms, complemented by views of the sparkling ocean, lush tropical gardens, or inviting swimming pool.

Guests of our AAA 4 Diamond Kauai resort enjoy direct access to Kalapaki Beach, its calm waters protected by a cove, ideal for swimming and light water sports. Embark on an adventure into the Garden Isle's spectacular nature reserves, with easy access to Kalepa Mountain Forest Reserve and the Ahukini Recreational Pier State Park.

Treat yourself to a soothing massage in our Alexander Day Spa and Salon. Make a splash and soak up the sun at the largest one-level pool in Hawaii. Break a sweat in our state-of-the-art fitness center. Indulge in a world of flavors at our in-house dining venues.

Stage a productive meeting or a luxurious bash in one of our flexible event facilities ranging from intimate boardrooms to spacious ballrooms.

View Our Live Feed

Early check-in at The Royal Sonesta Kaua'i Resort Lihue is subject to availability and must be requested in advance. If you need to check out later than the designated time, you must also coordinate with the hotel to see if a late checkout is possible. Upon arrival, you will be required to provide a valid credit card for incidentals during your stay.

Please note that guests must be 21 years or over to check in.

At The Royal Sonesta Kaua'i Resort Lihue, we are proud to offer a wide array of amenities and services designed to make your stay in Kauai as comfortable and effortless as possible.

Additionally, if you have any special requests for your stay, we would love to make them happen. Contact us at 808.245.5050.

Beach

Our Kauai resort is situated on the stunning Kalapaki Beach, providing you with immediate access to one of Hawaii's finest beaches.

Reserve a Beach Cabana

Swimming Pool

Take a revitalizing dip in the largest one-level pool in Hawaii, surrounded by the tranquil oasis of our oceanfront property.

Reserve a Poolside Cabana

Hours

Daily: 7:00AM  10:00PM

Fitness Center

Dont miss a beat in your fitness regimen. Our modern, round-the-clock fitness center is equipped with cardio gear, weightlifting machines, free weights, exercise mats, and stability balls.

Alexander Day Spa & Salon

Pamper yourself with our beachside spa treatments. Our spa offers a range of services designed for complete relaxation, including beach massages, spa massages, facials, body treatments, and more.

Hours

Daily: 8:00AM  6:00PM

Parking

Choose from either self-parking for $30 per day with in/out privileges or convenient valet parking service with in/out privileges for $40 per day. Enjoy added comfort with our on-site electric vehicle charging point.

Lihue Airport Shuttle

Enjoy a stress-free arrival and departure with our complimentary shuttle service between The Royal Sonesta Kaua'i Resort Lihue and Lihue Airport (LIH), located just 2 miles away. This convenient service is available to all resort guests around the clock.

Housekeeping

At The Royal Sonesta Kaua'i Resort Lihue, the health and safety of our guests is of utmost importance. For stays longer than 7 days, a full cleaning of the guest room will be provided once a week as part of our current housekeeping protocol. For additional cleaning services during your stay, please give us a minimum of 24 hours' notice and we will be happy to accommodate your needs. For additional towels, coffee and tea, or any other amenities, please don't hesitate to contact the front desk.

Laundry Services

Make use of our convenient laundry services, offering both full-service and self-serve options.

Discover the ultimate tropical getaway! Our family-friendly resort in Kauai offers a breathtaking location on Kalapaki Beach putting the Pacific's refreshing azure waters and thrilling outdoor activities right at your doorstep.

With a shimmering quarter-mile-long sandy shoreline, this breathtaking destination is the ultimate destination for water enthusiasts. Whether you're a first-time surfer or an experienced bodyboarder, Kalapaki Beach provides the perfect waves to perfect your skills and make memories that will last a lifetime.

But, if you prefer to simply relax, you can lounge in luxury on one of our comfortable cabanas or daybeds, basking in the sun and enjoying quality time with your loved ones. And for the ultimate indulgence, treat yourself to an exceptional dining experience with breathtaking oceanfront views.

Reserve a Beach Cabana

Kukuis on Kalapaki Beach

The resort's main restaurant offers culinary delights that blend international and local flavors. Unwind beside the pool as you begin your day with a satisfying breakfast or conclude it with a beautifully crafted tropical drink.

The Royal Lanai

Start your day with Kaua'i coffee and breakfast at our terrace, or relax in the evening with sushi and drinks by the pool.

View Breakfast Menu

View Sushi & Spirits Menu

Duke's Kauai

Savor Hawaiian-style dishes, steaks, and seafood at this seaside location that boasts breathtaking vistas.

Cafe Portofino

Indulge in the classic flavors of Italy at Caf Portofino, where you can dine al fresco and take in spectacular ocean views.

In-Room Dining

For those times when youd rather stay in, it is our pleasure to deliver a meal to your room.

Hours

Breakfast: 7:00AM - 11:00AM

Dinner: 5:00PM - 10:00PM

Savor the essence of island life as you enjoy a delicious meal by the pool, basking in the gentle ocean breeze. Indulge in a tempting array of international cuisine, expertly crafted with local ingredients and infused with the rich flavors of the Hawaiian Islands. Sip on the area's finest martinis and craft cocktails while dining on artfully presented dishes that will tantalize your taste buds.

Please note the following adjusted hours and locations, as we complete a renovation of Kukui's restaurant.

Hours

Breakfast (Buffet) - Puna Court

Daily: 7:00AM - 10:00AM

View Breakfast Menu

Lunch - Poolside Grill

Daily: 11:00AM - 5:00PM

Dinner - Poolside Grill

Thu/Fri/Sat/Sun/Mon: 5:00PM - 9:00PM

Bar

Daily: 11:00 AM  9:00 PM

Happy Hour

Friday  Sunday: 3:00 PM  5:00 PM

Featuring daily drink and food specials.

For reservations, call 808-246-5042.

For those looking to take a dip in the ocean and soak up the sun, there are several incredible beaches on the island to choose from.

Poipu Beach

Poipu Beach Park (15 miles away) is a popular spot known for its calm waters and excellent snorkeling opportunities.

Shipwreck Beach

For those seeking a secluded beach experience, Shipwreck Beach (15 miles away) is a great option with good surf and bodyboarding conditions, but please exercise caution as the waters can be rough.

Anini Beach

Anini Beach (30 miles away) is a long, sandy beach with great conditions for windsurfing and kayaking.

Hanalei Bay

Hanalei Bay (32 miles away) is a picturesque bay surrounded by lush greenery and offering excellent swimming, surfing, and sunbathing.

Whether you are traveling solo, with family, or friends, renting a car in Lihue offers maximum flexibility and convenience. Ask our staff for recommendations!

Explore Venue Instant Book Venue View Our Catering Menu

Experience the perfect blend of style, comfort, and convenience at our sophisticated Kauai resort. With over 27,000 square feet of versatile indoor and outdoor event space, you can host a truly unforgettable occasion, surrounded by the breathtaking beauty of our Hawaii resort.

Each of the 11 event spaces, including multiple pre-function areas, can be tailored to meet your specific needs. Our distinctive venues are well-equipped and perfect for hosting all kinds of meetings and special events, including:

Incentive Travel

Corporate Meetings

Government

Social Events

Weddings

Our flexible meeting rooms have the capacity to comfortably host groups ranging from 24 to 1,350 people. The Kauai Ballroom, a gorgeous gathering space of 17,280 square feet, is the largest on the island and offers views of picturesque gardens.

Hotel Highlights

Unique indoor and outdoor event spaces

Beachfront luau grounds

Largest ballroom on the island (The Kauai Ballroom)

Sprawling gardens

Breathtaking views

Situated right on the sandy shores of private Kalapaki Beach, the Luau Gardens offer ample space for your guests and provide stunning views of the ocean. With the help of our dedicated team, you can create a customized event menu for a memorable meeting or celebration.

Contact Us

The Royal Sonesta Kaua'i Resort Lihue is the perfect venue for conferences, training sessions, meetings, and events of all sizes. Request a proposal to start planning your event today.
